page.title: 04CLUBS(3)
page.content: HOUSECRAFT, MUSIC, ANIMAL CARE, BOOKS AND CRAFT. CUBS FOR BOYS FROM THE AGE OF 8 TO 11 IS HELD EVERY THURSDAY FROM 6.45 TO 8.15. ACTIVITIES INCLUDE GAMES, HIKES, CAMPS, AND PROFICIENCY BADGES. AT THE AGE OF TEN THE BOYS MAY GO TO SCOUTS WHICH IS HELD ON TUESDAYS FROM 7.00 TO 9.00. THE YOUTH CLUB IS DIVIDED INTO 2 SESSIONS; ONE FOR THE 9 TO 14 YEAR OLDS ON MONDAY EVENINGS AND ONE FOR THE 15 TO 19 YEAR OLDS ON WEDNSDAY EVENINGS. IT IS RUN BY 4 ADULTS WHO ORGANISE TABLE TENNIS, DARTS, GAMES, POOL AND DANCING. A TUCK SHOP SELLING SOFT DRINKS AND CONFECTIONARY IS OPEN FROM 7.00 TO 8.30. EVERY MONTH A DISCO IS HELD AND THROUGHOUT THE YEAR OUTINGS SUCH AS ICE-SKATING, DRY SLOPE SKIING, CANOEING AND TRIPS TO ALTON TOWERS ARE ARRANGED.
